About us

About Chai Point - Kirti Nagar Metro in Kirti Nagar

Chai Point, world's largest platform for chai-led beverages, is an omni channel brand started in 2010. Chai Point is now spread across India through its retail network of 180+ stores across 9 major cities with the motto of serving a great cup of tea to brighten people‚Äôs lives. We serve a range of tea variants such as masala tea & ginger tea, along with quick bites such as parathas, cookies, sandwiches, samosas, etc, with doorstep deliveries. We also serve 3500+ workplace community hubs covering 21+ cities through our brewing systems. We use single-origin Assam Chai and 100% Arabica coffee beans from Rainforest Alliance-certified estates of Chikmagalur, Karnataka. Next time you search for "tea near me" or "chai near me" remember Chai Point.

Ratings and Review of Chai Point - Kirti Nagar Metro in Kirti Nagar

5out of 5 61 Reviews

RISHI B

I visited Chai Point for the very first time because i needed to wait for someone and i was also craving the evening tea. I ordered a masala chai along with Bun Omelette. Wow! I honestly didn‚Äôt expected what i actually got. The chai tasted so good like i‚Äôm having it at home and the Bun Omelette was so fresh and tasty that i burned my mouth because i couldn‚Äôt wait to finish it hot üòÖ This is not a paid review but definitely an honest review and the very first impression of Chai Point on me. I hope their taste and service stays the same for the same pricing. Loved it ! Keep it up guys ! You made a real Tea Lover happy today !

Jayant

This location is based just under the metro station, although if you are coming car you might have to take a long u-turn to part at the metro parking. The Chai was really nice, but Cheese chilli toast was awful.

Aman Rajput

Sunny Dudhwal

Pradeep Kumar Verma

Attention to all the passionate Chai Lovers in Delhi, the moment you've been eagerly waiting for has arrived! We are thrilled to announce the grand opening of our brand-new store right in the heart of Delhi. The excitement is palpable, and we simply can't contain our enthusiasm. It's a moment that deserves a resounding cheer, so let's make some noise and CheerWithChai! Now, the big question that's on everyone's mind: Where could this enticing new store possibly be located? The anticipation is building, and we're here to tantalize your curiosity. We invite you to join in the fun, take a guess, and share your speculations. After all, the joy of a new store opening is only heightened when there's an element of surprise involved. So, Delhi, brace yourselves for a delightful experience that's about to unfold. With the arrival of our new store, your chai cravings will be answered in style. The heart of Delhi is about to get even more vibrant, and it's all thanks to our NewStoreAlert. Stay tuned, because the countdown to the big reveal has begun, and it's a celebration that no chai lover should miss.
